description.title: About This Product
description.content: This low dose pain reliever is great for pain for helping prevent heart attacks or clot-related strokes when recommended by your doctor. Bayer brings you trusted pain relief. Take aspirin for pain or for life.

productDetails.title: Product Details
features: Helps prevent a heart attack or clot-related (ischemic) stroke when taken as directed by your doctor
Aspirin is not appropriate for everyone, so be sure to talk to your doctor before you begin an aspirin regimen
Coated to make it easier to swallow

deliveryReturnPolicies.title: Delivery & Return Policies
deliveryReturnPolicies.returnPolicy:
If you wish to return your online order, please visit your order history to start the return process. If you have any issues, contact our Customer Care Support Center at 1-866-BIG-LOTS (244-5687) for assistance with making your return. Please be prepared to provide your order number and email address, or your rewards number, so that we may better assist you.

For return terms, see our full Returns Policy.

pickupDeliveryInfo.title: Pickup
pickupDeliveryInfo.description: In store pickup is FREE. Orders placed by 5pm local time can be picked up the same day.

sameDayDeliveryInfo.title: Same-Day Delivery
sameDayDeliveryInfo.description: Need it? Get it! Got it. Same Day Delivery available from select stores. You can choose from available delivery windows in cart.

parcelDeliveryInfo.title: Standard Delivery
parcelDeliveryInfo.description: Standard Delivery is FREE on orders over $79. Expedited delivery can be chosen in cart for eligible items.

customAccordions.title: Good To Know
customAccordions.description: We’ve got curbside pickup! Quick and contactless, simply place your order on Biglots.com. Once you arrive at the store, call the store and describe your car and we’ll bring your order right out to you. Just have your ID ready!

review.name: Great
review.reviewBody: It's a little pricey but it's great overall. I've tried multiple different brands of aspirin and I feel like the bear brand is the most effective for me has a lot of better ingredients and amazing packaging. The top is hard to get off so I think it's a good safety mechanism that they have.
